details: Pursuing an advanced degree focused on practical software engineering, maintaining high quality of craftsmanship while specializing in systems architecture
Mastering advanced algorithms and data structures through intensive project-based learning, with emphasis on optimization and scalability
Developing expertise in systems and webassembly programming using Rust, while expanding proficiency in C++, Go, and C through advanced coursework
Implementing complex embedded systems projects, gaining deep understanding of hardware-software integration and performance optimization
Examples of projects include building virtual machines, high-throughput networking applications, event-driven systems, and AI engineering with local LLMs

education.degree: Diploma of Full Stack Web Development
details: Completed rigorous 12-week immersive program with distinction, focusing on modern full-stack development methodologies
Architected and deployed multiple full-stack applications utilizing Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, emphasizing scalable design patterns
Implemented industry-standard Git workflows and collaborative development practices in team-based projects
Delivered capstone project that earned recognition for technical innovation and clean code architecture
Implemented comprehensive security protocols and best practices in real-world scenarios, achieving top marks in practical assessments
Executed detailed vulnerability assessments and penetration testing procedures, developing strategic mitigation strategies
Researched and analyzed emerging cybersecurity threats, contributing to development of proactive security frameworks
Mastered user-centered design principles through practical application in multiple client-focused projects
Conducted comprehensive user research and analysis, translating findings into actionable design strategies
Created high-fidelity prototypes and conducted extensive usability testing, resulting in measurable UX improvements
Mastered modern web development fundamentals, achieving perfect scores on all practical assessments
Developed responsive, accessible websites utilizing advanced CSS frameworks and methodologies
Implemented modern CSS architectures including Grid, Flexbox, and CSS custom properties for scalable designs
Excelled in front-end development fundamentals, focusing on modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries
Implemented complex asynchronous operations and API integrations using modern JavaScript practices
Developed responsive, interactive web applications emphasizing performance optimization and user experience
